column4: i just installed 5.10 Ubuntu and it never created or asked me to create a root account and access!  How can I do this?
how can I tell Ubuntu to use my serial mouse if I dont have root access?
do the keyboard work?
yes
did you get that pm?
what pm?
> I have only used kde before...but gnome is much more refined and uncluttered
> btw, you can open the xorg file and look at it first...but have to sudo gedit in order to make and save changes
I delete anything with "Options" ?
> the option in the mouse section yes
isnt there a mouseconfig command that will do this for me?
Driver  "mouse"
Option  "CorePointer"
Option  "Device"  "/dev/ttyS0"
Option  "Protocol"  "Microsoft"
so delete all those that says Options?
lightbright...config a mouse that does nto initialize or even get recognized is not benificail <-- lol, it is for people whos mouse doesnt work :P
If I delete all those Options, how will it know to use my mouse on "Device"  "/dev/ttyS0" ???
> the options i have left in the mouse section are : corepointer, device andprotocol...just leave those
ok but I thought you said to delete them all :P
yes
yes dial up, how can I dial out to my ISP?
doesnt seem that way
